entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 9:20 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with flurries or rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late in the afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h then west 30 gusting to 50 early in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:20 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
